title: WHO Bulletin Revives Focus on Traditional Medicine Ahead of Global Summit

title: Paytm unveils all-new app with clean interface, AI features to enhance payment experience
description: NEW DELHI, Nov 10:  Paytm (One 97 Communications Ltd), India’s full-stack merchant payments leader serving MSMEs and enterprises, has launched a fully redesigned version of its flagship app, integrating artificial intelligence-driven features to streamline and personalise everyday transactions for its users.   The update introduces a cleaner user interface alongside over 15 new features that seek to make payments faster and smarter for customers across the country, including Non-Resident Indians (NRIs) in 12 countries. One of the standout innovations is […]

title: AI is beating doctors at empathy - because we’ve turned doctors into robots
description: Artificial intelligence has mastered chess, art and medical diagnosis. Now it’s apparently beating doctors at something we thought was uniquely human: empathy.
content:
Artificial intelligence has mastered chess, art and medical diagnosis. Now it’s apparently beating doctors at something we thought was uniquely human: empathy.

title: LTIMindtree Bets On AI To Boost Margins, Eyes Double-Digit Growth In H2FY26
description: LTIMindtree posted a strong second-quarter performance for FY26, comfortably beating Street expectations on both revenue and profitability, powered by its “Fit for Future” efficiency drive and accelerating the adoption of artificial intelligence across delivery and operations. The IT services major’s consolidated revenue crossed the Rs.10,000-crore mark for the first time, rising 5.6% sequentially to Rs.10,394 crore in the Sept. quarter of FY26.
content: LTIMindtree posted a strong second-quarter performance for FY26, comfortably beating Street expectations driven by both revenue and profitability. The growth was powered by its “Fit for Future” efficiency drive and increasing adoption of artificial i... [1553 chars]

title: How Canadian startup Hyper is using AI to help field non-emergency police calls
description: Company developed artificial intelligence voice agent to handle less-urgent requests, ease burden on 911 operators
content:
Most people don’t realize that when calling a police department’s non-emergency phone line – to report the proverbial cat stuck up a tree, say – you can be connected with a 911 operator who handles actual life-or-death situations.

title: Penn, Jefferson doctors using AI to take notes during exams
description: Ambient listening and AI scribes are among the artificial intelligence tools gaining traction at health systems across the country.
content:
Bracken Babula starts patient visits these days by closing the exam room door, and asking if they mind him recording their conversation. He hits a button on his mobile phone, checks that it is recording, and sits back in his seat to listen.

title: TSMC’s slowing monthly sales fuel AI sustainability debate
description: Investors were jolted last week by a sudden slump in Asia’s technology shares, which served as a stark reminder that the world-beating rally in artificial intelligence and semiconductor stocks may be nearing a short-term crest.
content:
Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. reported slowing growth in monthly revenue, highlighting uncertainty over the sustainability of the AI boom even as industry behemoths including Nvidia Corp. chase more chip orders.
